description: Yeehaa excels in transformative design with a background in cognitive science and extensive experience in both academics and industry. Known for innovation, project leadership, and user-centered design, Yeehaa has authored insightful blog posts and curated strategic courses. With a unique combination of creativity and analytical skills, Yeehaa fosters vibrant, sustainable digital ecosystems.
blurb: Fragmentation of the internet mirrors Earth's tectonic shifts and exploitative tech practices. Embracing fragmented systems, 'ecosystem architecture' aims for creating vibrant, sustainable digital ecosystems.
